function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of strong healthcare system","Impact":"Increase in the number of dead and infected with virus of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure and resources","Technologies":"Medical equipment and supplies, telemedicine, public health surveillance systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, government","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 virus","Impact":"Increase in the number of infected people","Mitigation":"Implementing healthy protocols and sanitation measures","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, personal protective equipment, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential service workers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, employers"},{"Description":"Inadequate respiratory system function","Impact":"Limited ability to combat respiratory illnesses, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of physical therapy techniques to improve respiratory system function","Technologies":"Respiratory therapy equipment, medical devices for respiratory support, tele-rehabilitation tools","People":"Individuals with respiratory illnesses, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical professionals"}]}
